title: MAKE MONEY with this EASY KDP Niche - Keyword Research and Tutorial
description:
In this video, I’ll go into the potentially highly profitable vision board niche. I’ll look at and analyze some key competitors' books, BSR's as well as find patterns these books are using that could be attributing to their success. Then I'll go through keyword research for this niche and show some ways to make interiors for a vision board book that you could make with a program like Canva.
